title: Intergalactic Cruiser X-500
description: A high-performance spacecraft designed for long-distance travel across galaxies. Features advanced propulsion systems and comfortable living quarters for extended missions.

title: Quantum Navigation System
description: State-of-the-art navigation technology that uses quantum entanglement to plot the most efficient routes through space-time. Essential for any serious space explorer.

title: Zero-G Coffee Maker Deluxe
description: Brew the perfect cup of coffee in zero gravity. Temperature-controlled brewing chamber ensures consistent quality whether you're orbiting Earth or exploring distant nebulae.

title: Space Sheep Transport Pod
description: Specially designed for the safe and comfortable transport of space sheep. Climate-controlled interior with automated feeding systems and entertainment for your woolly friends.

title: Solar Shield Generator
description: Protect your spacecraft from harmful solar radiation and micro-meteorites with this advanced shielding technology. Automatically adjusts strength based on detected threats.

title: Freeze-Dried Space Food Collection
description: A 6-month supply of nutritionally balanced, delicious freeze-dried meals. Includes favorites like 'Nebula Noodles' and 'Asteroid Stew'. Just add water and enjoy!

title: Advanced EVA Suit
description: Top-of-the-line extravehicular activity suit with 48-hour life support, enhanced mobility joints, and built-in communication systems. Perfect for spacewalks and planetary exploration.

title: Mini Research Station
description: Compact orbital laboratory perfect for scientific research and observations. Includes docking capabilities, solar power arrays, and modular experiment bays.

title: Oxygen Regeneration Cartridges
description: Pack of 12 high-capacity oxygen regeneration cartridges. Each cartridge provides breathable air for up to 30 days for a single person. Essential for extended missions.

title: Holographic Communication Terminal
description: Stay in touch with loved ones across the galaxy with crystal-clear holographic projection. Supports real-time communication via quantum relay networks.

title: Emergency Escape Pod
description: Compact single-person escape pod with automatic distress beacon, 7-day life support, and AI-assisted landing capabilities. Safety first in the vast cosmos.

title: Hydroponic Garden Kit
description: Grow fresh vegetables and herbs in space with this complete hydroponic system. Includes seeds for 20 varieties of plants and automated nutrient delivery.
